# Simple Math

A simple Python package for basic mathematical operations.

## Installation

```bash
pip install simple-math
```

## Usage

```python
from simple_math import add, subtract, multiply, divide

print(add(5, 3))        # 8
print(subtract(5, 3))   # 2
print(multiply(5, 3))   # 15
print(divide(10, 2))    # 5.0
```
